pages.title: Laminated Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Laminated" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Orange Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Laminated Crystal Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Laminated Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Laminated Crystal Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Laminated Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "Stratospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Orange Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Laminated Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Laminated Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Laminated Crystal", and "Liquid Orange Dragon Essence".

pages.title: Nether Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Exospherical Nether Portal

pages.title: End Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Exospherical End Portal

pages.title: Return Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Exospherical Portal
